posts.postText: I didn't seem to get the donation, did you by any chance send it to Ben?

I donated to https://www.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_flow&SESSION=ci5XRtIftzsbGJ_feN6ayf2jVRIv9I7DaHQOWCcq2UikFTVrctg08wIk4ne&dispatch=5885d80a13c0db1f8e263663d3faee8d35d0e363192f28ea2a5d17702da0dbf0.

I used this thread http://nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=34&t=3451

The paypal link I am unable to view, Treecko, I'm going to assume you donated for Purple?
If so, can you please screenshot the paypal transaction? I don't see anything from William Lawley.

Oh, I found my mistake. Sorry about that! 

Thank you for your donation, the steamid you provided has been added to VIP.
